title: CSPGCL Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for 245 Apprentice Posts
description: The Chhattisgarh State Power Generation Company Limited (CSPGCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 245 Graduate Apprentices, Diploma Apprentices, and Trade Apprentices. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their ITI, Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Mechanical, Electrical, and Civil Engineering, can apply for the CSPGCL Notification 2026. The ...
